settings.prefix: declare @DiagramSPPath nvarchar(512) select @DiagramSPPath = quotename(db_name()) + '.dbo.sp_helpdiagrams' create table #tmp_sp_helpdiagrams ([Database] sysname not null, Name sysname not null, ID int not null, Owner sysname null, OwnerID int not null) insert into #tmp_sp_helpdiagrams exec @DiagramSPPath

properties.property: 'Server[@Name=' + quotename(cast(serverproperty(N'Servername') as sysname),'''') + ']/Database[@Name=' + quotename(db_name(),'''') + ']/DatabaseDiagram[@Name=' + quotename(tshd.Name,'''') + ' and @OwnerID=' + quotename(cast(tshd.OwnerID as nvarchar(30)),'''') + ']'
